mapper.select: SELECT fileno, fname, filepath, thumbnailPath, type, size, DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS regdate, DATE_FORMAT(editdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS editdate, reftable, refid FROM files WHERE fileno=#{fileno}

SELECT fileno, fname, filepath, fileUrl, thumbnailPath, type, size, DATE_FORMAT(editdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS editdate, concat(reftable, '-', refid) FROM files WHERE reftable='bbs' AND refid=#{refid}

SELECT fileno, fname, filepath, fileUrl, thumbnailPath, type, size, DATE_FORMAT(editdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS editdate, concat(reftable, '-', refid) FROM files WHERE reftable='product' AND refid=#{refid}

SELECT fileno, fname, filepath, thumbnailPath, type, size, DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS regdate, DATE_FORMAT(editdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS editdate, reftable, refid FROM files
fname LIKE concat('%', #{fname}, '%')
ORDER BY fileno DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{listCount}

SELECT filepath, reftable, refid FROM files
reftable LIKE 'p%'
AND fname LIKE concat('%', #{fname}, '%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM files
fname LIKE concat('%', #{fname}, '%')
